page.title: 07 THE AMBULANCE MAN
page.content: I woke early to go to work.I put on my dark blue uniform and had breakfast.My shift this week is 8:00am to 2:00pm I like my work because I like helping people.Soon after I arrived at work the telephone rang.It was someone ringing to say her daughter had fallen downstairs.I am driver today so my partner rode in the cabin.I switched on the siren and blue flashing lamp on the top we went quickly back carefully through the traffic.At he house we found the girl had broken her arm.I put on an inflatable splint and took her to the ambulance in the special carrying chair.Her mother came too.My partner gave her a little epinox gas as her arm hurt her.We took her to the casualty unit at Ascot where her arm would be treated then back to the station.When we got back the other van had gone to get some old people.
